articles.title: Asia stocks fall as Wall Street rally stalls

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Canada's BlackBerry (BB.TO) reported a surprise quarterly profit on Wednesday, backed by a resilient demand for cybersecurity services amid rising online threats.
articles.title: BlackBerry posts surprise quarterly profit on resilient cybersecurity demand

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Warner Bros Discovery (WBD.O) CEO David Zaslav met with Paramount Global (PARA.O) CEO Bob Bakish to discuss a potential deal between the two companies, a source told Reuters on Wednesday.
articles.title: Warner Bros Discovery, Paramount Global met to discuss potential deal - source

articles.author: Riham Alkousaa, Sarah Marsh
articles.description: Rosneft (ROSN.MM) representatives will travel to Berlin on Friday to discuss a possible sale of the Russian oil giant's German assets, among other options, with government officials, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.
articles.title: Exclusive: Rosneft to discuss possible German asset sale with Berlin on Friday - source

articles.author: Lucia Mutikani
articles.description: U.S. consumer confidence increased to a five-month high in December, with Americans growing more optimistic about current and future business conditions as well as the labor market, which could help to underpin the economy early next year.
articles.title: US consumer confidence jumps to five-month high; home sales eke out gains

articles.author: Manya Saini
articles.description: Management consulting firm Aon (AON.N) said on Wednesday it will buy privately held NFP in a deal valued at about $13.4 billion to tap the fast-growing middle-market segment of insurance brokerage, wealth management and retirement plan advisory.
articles.title: Aon to buy middle-market insurance broker NFP in $13.4 bln deal

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.description: U.S. new vehicles set a record high for fuel economy in 2022, with the biggest yearly improvement in nine years to an average of 26 miles per gallon (mpg) as electric vehicle sales jumped but the Detroit Three automakers continued to lag rivals.
articles.title: US vehicles set fuel economy record in 2022 as EV sales climb

articles.author: James Pomfret, Yimou Lee
articles.description: The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) is ramping up exchanges with folk religious groups in rural Taiwan in an attempt to manipulate political opinion in Beijing's favour ahead of elections next month, according to Taiwan government documents and security officials.
articles.title: China wields Mazu 'peace goddess' religion as weapon in Taiwan election

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Dan Williams
articles.description: The U.S. said "very serious" negotiations were taking place on a new Gaza ceasefire and release of more Israeli hostages, but prospects for a deal remained uncertain as Hamas insisted it would not discuss anything less than a complete end to Israel's offensive in the Palestinian enclave.
articles.title: Egypt seeks to broker Gaza ceasefire as Hamas, Israel assert demands

articles.author: James Oliphant, Nandita Bose
articles.description: The latest legal challenge to Donald Trump's campaign for a second term as president seems likely to hand the 2024 Republican frontrunner even more firepower in his quest to win his party's nomination.
articles.title: Colorado ballot case adds fuel to Trump's nomination drive
